price: 20. el cual ha sido dotado de poder y dispone de una posición elevada ante el Señor del Trono,
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
